Who wants to sit through a 20 minute demonstration video asking for likes and general fluff just to learn how to change car oil? Not us!

In 2023, We Show You was born with the commitment to only allowing videos to be published that are maximum 5 minutes in length. Its not about who you are, its about what you can do! Be creative and find a way to show your demonstration in a short amount of time. Trust us, we've done it. A lot.
